Articles.Content:
Hi I am Loving this Simulation.

It is such a challenging process getting to the moons surface and back with the stock parts.

Nice to meet all of you.

Welcome to the community klugman

If you can orbit, you are half way to anywhere And congrats on reaching the Mun.

I thought that too once

I remember when I got KSP about 6 months ago, we were on .18.2 I think. I had a hell of a time getting to the moon. Then I kept smearing my landers across the surface.

My next problem was trying to take off again. Never had enough fuel

Now 6 months later I'm testing out rockets to tour the solar system with.

Point is, as you learn more about the physics of the game and what will get you where, you'll realize the game becomes much more manageable.

Welcome to the forums, klugman.

It sure is nice to meet you, good luck with your future missions, you're doing well so far and if you need any help, just ask.

Have fun playing KSP and good luck!

Welcome to the forums mate!

... why can i never think of anything to say apart from the generic greeting?

oh well, welcome
